overview: Five years ago, the family member of a man named J Cash was executed as a result of bad business. The murder was ordered by ruthless drug lord, Big Lou who seems to have no regards for life or death. Demanding answers, J Cash, along with ex-con Simon and sexy cop Officer Janet, attempts to get close to Lou in order to avenge his deceased relative. How far will J Cash go to make things right?
title: Triple D Revenge
